section.title: Maintain External Shipping Records
section.para: The Maintain External Shipping Records screen is a kind of workbench where you can manage shipping information exported to UPS WorldShip and similar packages. To maintain external shipping records, select the "Maintain External Shipping Records" option. The following screen will appear:
The Maintain External Shipping Records screens lists all the shipping records exported from xTuple ERP to UPS WorldShip and similar packages.
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating external shipping data.
Opens screen for entering new shipping data.

Enables you to edit shipping data. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new shipping dataâ€”except that when editing, the fields will contain existing shipping information. Double-clicking on a shipping record will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a shipping record and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a shipping record and then select this button to remove the record from the list.
